summary.para: Contains information about system battery drain policy settings. This structure is part of the structure.
If this member is TRUE, the alarm should be activated when the battery discharges below the value set in BatteryLevel.
The battery capacity for this battery discharge policy, expressed as a percentage.
A structure that defines the action to take for this battery discharge policy.
The minimum system sleep state to enter when the battery discharges below the value set in BatteryLevel. This member must be one of the enumeration type values.
